data.title: AI is taking jobs — here’s Coursera CEO's No. 1 tip for grads to stay competitive
data.description: "They're [recruiters] going to be assessing your mindset and your traits as a human being more than your experience," Coursera's CEO told CNBC Make It.
data.author: Sawdah Bhaimiya
data.keywords: Interview,Job hunting,Jobs,Graduate education,Graduation,Generative AI,Artificial intelligence,Greg Hart,Coursera Inc,Jobs,Amazon.com Inc,Salesforce Inc
